accounts.ai_summary: OpenAI发布GPT-5基准测试结果，在数学推理和代码生成方面较GPT-4o提升显著，并宣布面向企业的新API定价方案。

tweets.text: Introducing GPT-5: Our most capable model yet. Significant improvements in mathematical reasoning, code generation, and multilingual understanding. Available today for ChatGPT Plus and Enterprise users.

GPT-5 benchmark results:
- MATH: 92.4% (+8.1%)
- HumanEval: 96.1% (+5.3%)
- MMLU: 91.8% (+3.2%)

Full technical report: openai.com/research/gpt-5

New API pricing for GPT-5:
- Input: $3/1M tokens
- Output: $15/1M tokens

Enterprise volume discounts available. Migration guide at platform.openai.com/docs/migration

accounts.ai_summary: 马斯克宣布Grok 3将于下周发布，称其在多项基准上超越GPT-5，同时讨论了xAI的开源计划。

tweets.text: Grok 3 coming next week. It's insane. Beats GPT-5 on most benchmarks.
xAI will open source Grok 2.5 when Grok 3 launches. All weights, no restrictions.
The pace of AI improvement is staggering. The world in 2027 will be unrecognizable from 2024.

accounts.ai_summary: Karpathy分享了关于LLM训练中数据质量比数据数量更重要的深度分析，并推荐了一篇关于合成数据生成的新论文。

tweets.text:
Hot take: We're hitting diminishing returns on scaling data quantity. The next frontier is data quality and curriculum design. A well-curated 1T token dataset can outperform a noisy 10T dataset.

Thread on what I've learned about data quality in LLM training:

Excellent new paper on synthetic data generation for code: 'CodeWeave: Generating Structured Training Data via LLM-Guided Program Synthesis'

arxiv.org/abs/2026.01234

Key insight: using AST-guided generation produces 3x more diverse code samples than naive prompting.

accounts.ai_summary: Vitalik发布以太坊2026年技术路线图更新，重点介绍了Verkle树迁移进展和L2互操作性改进方案。

tweets.text:
Updated Ethereum roadmap for 2026:

1. Verkle tree migration (Pectra upgrade) - Q2 2026
2. L2 interop standards (cross-L2 messaging)
3. Account abstraction improvements
4. Further blob scaling (EIP-7594)

Blog post with full details: vitalik.eth.limo/roadmap2026

The most underappreciated aspect of Ethereum's future: cross-L2 composability. When you can atomically call contracts across Arbitrum, Optimism and Base in a single transaction, it changes everything about how we think about L2s.

accounts.ai_summary: Sam Altman透露OpenAI正在开发AI Agent平台，预计Q2发布，并分享了对AGI时间线的最新看法。

tweets.text: We're building something that will make AI agents truly useful for everyday work. Not just chatbots - actual agents that can take actions, use tools, and complete complex multi-step tasks. Shipping in Q2.

I think we'll have systems that most people would agree qualify as AGI within the next 2-3 years. The question isn't really 'if' anymore, it's about how we deploy it safely and make sure the benefits are widely shared.
